name: Crash Car Mania
storyline: Perform death defying challenges and put your life on the line in Crash Car Mania. Wow the crowds by launching your driver through 15 levels of steep drops, jump ramps, explosive bouncers and burning rings of fire. Use your skills to link over-the-top combos, handle different vehicles, and navigate your way through the stunt riddled course. Defy gravity, top the leader-board, and unlock key achievements in a new level of insane arcade stunt action.
summary: Take part in the death race in this game. Ride fast and crash cars of your rivals. It will be harder with each new level. But you can upgrade your car and open new abilities, it will help you. Roar of the engine and clang of metal will not leave you indifferent.
